languages.text: "Странно живется, Ваша Светлость. Болячек в отсеке стало больше, но помирают от них теперь реже. Это ж... благо, да? Голод отступил — господа блюстители стали подкидывать в чан какого-то мясца. Вот только... порой слышу, как об стенки что-то стукает. Там же ничего живого не может быть? Простите дурака, мерещится всякое".

"It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."
languages.original_text: "Странно живется, Ваша Светлость. Болячек в отсеке стало больше, но помирают от них теперь реже. Это ж... благо, да? languages.text: "Das Leben hier ist seltsam, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Krankheiten waren in diesem Modul auf dem Vormarsch, aber mittlerweile sterben weniger Leute daran. Das ... ist gut, oder? Der Hunger ist gelindert. Unsere geschätzten Enforcer haben irgendein Fleisch in das Fass geworfen. Allerdings ... Ab und an höre ich etwas an seine Wände klopfen. Da kann doch nichts Lebendiges drin sein, oder? Vergebt mir. Ich bin nur ein Narr, der Dinge hört."
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."

Da kann doch nichts Lebendiges drin sein, oder? Vergebt mir. Ich bin nur ein Narr, der Dinge hört."

languages.text: « C'est une vie étrange, Votre Seigneurie. Les maladies sont en augmentation sur cette baie, mais moins de gens en meurent. C'est plutôt... une bonne chose, j'imagine. Nous souffrons moins de la faim. Nos estimés prévôts ont ajouté de la viande dans la cuve. C'est juste que... j'entends parfois quelque chose cogner contre ses parois. Il n'y a rien de vivant là-dedans, n'est-ce pas ? Pardonnez-moi. Ça doit être mon imagination qui me joue des tours. »
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une vie étrange, Votre Seigneurie. Les maladies sont en augmentation sur cette baie, mais moins de gens en meurent. C'est plutôt... une bonne chose, j'imagine. Nous souffrons moins de la faim. Nos estimés prévôts ont ajouté de la viande dans la cuve. C'est juste que... j'entends parfois quelque chose cogner contre ses parois. Il n'y a rien de vivant là-dedans, n'est-ce pas ? Pardonnez-moi. Ça doit être mon imagination qui me joue des tours. »

languages.text: «Es una vida peculiar, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las enfermedades han proliferado en este compartimento, pero ya apenas se muere nadie por ellas. Eso es... ¿bueno, supongo? Nadie pasa hambre. Los estimados guardias añaden algún tipo de carne a las cubas. Lo que pasa es que... a veces oigo que algo golpea las paredes desde dentro. No estarán echando nada vivo ahí dentro, ¿verdad? Perdóneme. No soy más que un necio que se imagina que oye cosas».
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."

traits.locale_text: «Es una vida peculiar, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las enfermedades han proliferado en este compartimento, pero ya apenas se muere nadie por ellas. Eso es... ¿bueno, supongo? Nadie pasa hambre. Los estimados guardias añaden algún tipo de carne a las cubas. Lo que pasa es que... a veces oigo que algo golpea las paredes desde dentro. No estarán echando nada vivo ahí dentro, ¿verdad? Perdóneme. No soy más que un necio que se imagina que oye cosas».

languages.text: 「奇妙な人生です。このベイでは病は増えているものの、それで死ぬ人間は減っています。それは…いいこと、ですよね？飢えは和らぎました。ワシらが尊敬するエンフォーサーが、タンクの中に何かの肉を放り込んでくださっている。ただ、その….時々壁に何かがぶつかる音がするんです。中に生き物がいるはずはありませんよね？申し訳ありません。きっと私は幻聴が聞こえる愚か者なのです」
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙な人生です。このベイでは病は増えているものの、それで死ぬ人間は減っています。それは…いいこと、ですよね？飢えは和らぎました。ワシらが尊敬するエンフォーサーが、タンクの中に何かの肉を放り込んでくださっている。ただ、その….時々壁に何かがぶつかる音がするんです。中に生き物がいるはずはありませんよね？申し訳ありません。きっと私は幻聴が聞こえる愚か者なのです」

languages.text: “我们的生活变得很奇怪，大人。这片甲板感染疾病的人越来越多，可病死的人却越来越少了，这……这应该是件好事，是吧？饥荒也不像以前那么严重了，那些尊敬的执法者把某种像肉一样的东西丢进了大缸里。不过……我偶尔会听到好像有什么东西在敲缸壁，不过缸里总不会有活着的东西吧？请原谅，大人，我只是个听了些风言风语就胡说八道的白痴。”
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."

traits.locale_text: “我们的生活变得很奇怪，大人。这片甲板感染疾病的人越来越多，可病死的人却越来越少了，这……这应该是件好事，是吧？饥荒也不像以前那么严重了，那些尊敬的执法者把某种像肉一样的东西丢进了大缸里。不过……我偶尔会听到好像有什么东西在敲缸壁，不过缸里总不会有活着的东西吧？请原谅，大人，我只是个听了些风言风语就胡说八道的白痴。”

languages.text: "Bu, tuhaf bir hayat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu bölmede hastalıklarda artış var ancak çok daha az insanı kaybediyoruz. Bu... İyi bir şey, değil mi? Açlık oranı azaldı. Kıymetli infazcılarımız, tanka bir tür et bırakıyorlar. Ne var ki... Arada sırada tankın duvarlarına bir şeylerin vurduğunu duyuyorum. Orada yaşayan bir şey olamaz, değil mi? Affınıza sığınıyorum. Ben yalnızca bir şeyler duyan ahmağın tekiyim."
languages.original_text: "It's a strange life, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Diseases have been on the rise in this bay but fewer people are dying of them. That's... a good thing, right? The hunger's abated. Our esteemed enforcers have been tossing some kind of meat into the vat. It's just that... I sometimes hear something bang against its walls. There can't be anything alive inside, can there? Forgive me. I'm just a fool who hears things."
